doc:
Nancy Olson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nancy_Olson 0 Nancy Ann Olson (born July 14, 1928) is an American actress. She received an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of Betty Schaefer in Sunset Boulevard (1950). She co-starred with William Holden in four films, and also later appeared in Disney's The Absent-Minded Professor (1961) and its sequel, Son of Flubber (1963), as well as the disaster film Airport 1975 (1974). Olson has been virtually retired from acting since the early 1980s, although she has made a few rare returns, most recently in 2014. Nancy_Ann_Olson ( born July_14_,_1928 ) is an_American_actress . She received an_Academy_Award_nomination for Best_Supporting_Actress for her_portrayal of Betty_Schaefer in Sunset_Boulevard_(_1950_) . She co-starred with William_Holden in four_films , and also later appeared in Disney 's_The_Absent-Minded_Professor_(_1961_) and its_sequel , Son of Flubber_(_1963_) , as_well_as the_disaster_film_Airport 1975_(_1974_) . Olson has_been_virtually_retired from acting since the_early_1980s , although she has_made a_few_rare_returns , most_recently in 2014 .
